# init(_:affinity:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new text selection with the location and selection affinity you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(_ location: any NSTextLocation, affinity: NSTextSelection.Affinity)
```

## Parameters

- **location**: The text location
- **affinity**: One of the possible [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextSelection/Affinity-swift.enum] options.

## Creating a text selection

- **init(range:affinity:granularity:)**: Creates a new text selection with the range, selection affinity, and granularity you provide.
- **init(_:affinity:granularity:)**: Creates a new text selection with the ranges, selection affinity, and granularity you provide.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates a test selection from data in an unarchiver.
